title: Rhode Island Revises Its Problematic Name & Blacklexa | Bubba Wallace & John Legend
itunes:title: Rhode Island Revises Its Problematic Name & Blacklexa | Bubba Wallace & John Legend
description:
NASCAR driver Bubba Wallace reflects on the noose controversy, Trevor introduces Blacklexa, and John Legend talks about fighting for racial equality and his album "Bigger Love."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
